name: postcss-rtlcss
description: PostCSS plugin to build Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) with Left-To-Right (LTR) and Right-To-Left (RTL) rules

scripts.build: yarn clean && rollup --config rollup.config.js --bundleConfigAsCjs && yarn copy && yarn modify-dts
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run test
